author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Coronavirus: Here's how you can stop bad information from going viral
description: Experts are calling on the public to practice ‘information hygiene’ to help stop the spread of falsehoods online.
content:
Coronavirus misinformation is flooding the internet and experts are calling on the public to practice "information hygiene". What can you do to stop the spread of bad information? 
1. Stop and think
